reporting-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre

title.narrative: Psychological and social support for Syrian citizens affected by the humanitarian crisis in Greece.

description.narrative: - Strengthening the provision of psychosocial assistance and cultural mediation at reception and identification centers in the islands and the provision of vocational training for unaccompanied minors of Syrian origin residing in specialized accommodation facilities on the mainland - Strengthening national authorities in providing psychosocial support and cultural mediation to vulnerable beneficiaries hosted in Lesvos and Samos - Enabling unaccompanied Syrian children to acquire skills and build resilience through participation in vocational training.
Psychological and social support for syrian citizens affected by the humanitarian crisis in Greece

participating-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre
